description: This source file defines the root layout component for a Remix-run React application, setting up document head metadata, external stylesheets, and rendering the outlet for nested routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines the external stylesheet and preconnect links for the application.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the HTML structure, including meta tags, styles, and script outlets, wrapping child components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component that renders the current route's outlet.
